ModMetaData.name: Chinampa Farming
ModMetaData.author: cem
ModMetaData.description:
This mod introduces the ancient farming technique of chinampas, or "floating gardens", to RimWorld. Harness the productive potential of waterlogged and swampy terrain (any bridgeable terrain), emulating age-old agricultural practices seen across the globe, from the Aztecs to the swamps of Iraq.
For getting hay early and quickly we recommend the mod 'Grass Is Still Hay' (https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2882481802) which allows an early source of hay from grass cutting and makes chinampa creation a viable option in diverse environments.
